register.title: Register your store
register.subtitle: Grow your business — join our platform today.

error.invalidUrl: Please enter a valid website URL. (e.g. www.example.com).
error.emailRequired: Enter your email to receive future updates.
error.emailInvalid: Please enter a valid email address.

approvalDialog.title: Wait for approval
approvalDialog.text:
Manager approval typically takes up to 5 business days.
Please note that you won't be able to see your store on the map until your request has been approved.

changePassDialog.title: New password set successful!
changePassDialog.secondaryText: Your password has been successfully update!

alreadyRegisteredDialog.title: Registration already applied
alreadyRegisteredDialog.text:
You have already applied with this KVK number, and your application is under review. Manager approval typically takes up to 5 business days.
Please note that your store will not appear on the map until your request is approved.

login.title: Log in
login.subtitle: to continue to your Local for Local account.

error.validEmail: Please enter a valid email address.

recover.title: Forgot your password?
recover.subtitle: Please enter the following information to set a new password:

error.confirmPasswordMatch: Confirm password has to match with password
error.passwordRequirements: Password must be at least 8 characters.Include at least one capital letter, one number and one symbol.

dashboard.changeRateMsg: You can change the rate by accessing your Profile page.

inviteMerchants.title: Invite merchants
inviteMerchants.subtitle: Send an invitation to merchants to join Local for Local.
inviteMerchants.emailsHint: You can add multiple email addresses by pressing Enter after each one.

error.emailPattern: Please enter a valid email address.
error.emailAlreadyInList: This e-mail is already in the list.
error.emailsLimitReached: You've reached the limit of 50 emails.

noData.title: Welcome to Invitations
noData.description: It looks like you haven’t sent any invitations yet. Let's start inviting merchants.

mfa.title: Two-factor authentication
mfa.subtitle:
To continue, enter the secure code we sent to your e-mail.
Check junk mail if it’s not in your inbox.
mfa.label: 6-digit code

approveMerchant.title: Approve request
approveMerchant.subtitle: By approving this merchant, you allow them to appear on the map showing which suppliers accept X currency.

rejectMerchant.title: Reject request
rejectMerchant.subtitle: By rejecting this merchant, you prevent them from appearing on the map showing which suppliers accept X currency.

errors.40007: Ooops we got an error. Invalid credentials. Please try again or use the forgot password option
errors.40003: Certain details in your request are incomplete. Please give it another try.
errors.40005: Your attempt was unsuccessful multiple times. Please complete the ReCAPTCHA to proceed.
errors.40014: You can only initiate three password recovery attempts per day.
errors.40016: The link for password recovery has expired.
errors.40017: Your new password matches your old one. Please choose a different password.
